text: Ē'ibōra janapadara kichu biraraṇa āmi tōmāra ōcarata barṇanā karai āchō, siham̐tara ōcarata siham̐tara raāchulasakalē spaṣṭa pramāṇasaha āhichila; kintu pūrbē siham̐tē yiṭō michā buli agraāhya karaichila sēẏā dunā'i biśbāsa karaibalai siham̐tē mānti nahaẏa. Ē'idaraē'i āllāhē kāphirasakalara antarata mōhara mārai diẏē
